runners.source: select id,open_id,union_id,uid,mobile,to_timestamp(gmt_bind,'yyyy-MM-ddHH:mm:ss') as gmt_bind,cus_status,cus_type,country,province,city,district,gender,to_timestamp(gmt_login,'yyyy-MM-ddHH:mm:ss') as gmt_login,birthday,cus_manager,remark,version,tenant_id,creator_name,to_timestamp(gmt_create,'yyyy-MM-ddHH:mm:ss') as gmt_create,to_timestamp(gmt_modified,'yyyy-MM-ddHH:mm:ss') as gmt_modified,source,appid,micro_app_type,logout_status,etl_datetime,dt from ods.ods_mr_crm_customer_di where dt<=$dt

runners.sql: select row_number() over (partition by id order by dt desc) as row_number,* from tmp_1
